Body.Name: VBR-CreateProtectionGroupBackupJobv1.0

InputDefinition.Description: The PowerShell endpoint on which the script is to be executed. PowerShell Remoting must be enabled on the endpoint to allow for scripts to be executed remotely.
InputDefinition.Label: External Target
InputDefinition.Name: Target

Properties.Selector: /api/v1/asset/Targets?$filter=(TargetType eq PowerShellEndpoint and Status eq Connected)

Batch.Body:
#
# Add a backup job for the specified VBR protection group per the target platform (Windows,
# Linux) specified. The job is scheduled to run at 11:00 pm every day.
#
# Inputs: protection group name "protectiongroupname", backup job name "backupjobname",
# backup repository name "backupreponame" and protection group OS type "agentplatform" (0 -
# Windows, 1 - Linux)
#
try {
    $protectionGroup = Get-VBRProtectionGroup -Name "{{.global.task.input.protectiongroupname}}"

    $repository = Get-VBRBackupRepository -Name "{{.global.task.input.backupreponame}}"

    $daily = New-VBRDailyOptions -Type Everyday -Period 23:00

    switch ({{.global.task.input.agentplatform}})
    {
        0 { #Windows
            $schedule = New-VBRServerScheduleOptions -Type Daily -DailyOptions $daily
            Add-VBRComputerBackupJob -OSPlatform Windows -Type Server -Mode ManagedByBackupServer -BackupObject $protectionGroup `
              -BackupType EntireComputer -Name "{{.global.task.input.backupjobname}}" -Description "Cisco Intersight-automated agent backup" `
              -BackupRepository $repository -EnableSchedule -ScheduleOptions $schedule
        }

        1 { #Linux
            $schedule = New-VBRServerScheduleOptions -Type Daily -DailyOptions $daily
            Add-VBRComputerBackupJob -OSPlatform Linux -Type Server -Mode ManagedByBackupServer -BackupObject $protectionGroup `
              -BackupType EntireComputer -Name "{{.global.task.input.backupjobname}}" -Description "Cisco Intersight-automated agent backup" `
              -BackupRepository $repository -EnableSchedule -ScheduleOptions $schedule
        }

        Default {
            Write-Output "Unsupported platform"
            exit 1
        }
    }
    exit 0
}
catch {
    Write-Output "Exception in add protection group backup job"
    exit 1
}
Batch.Label: VBR - Create Protection Group Backup Job
Batch.Name: InvokePowerShellScript1
